title: Galloway Says Twitter Should Consider Subscription Model
itunes:title: Galloway Says Twitter Should Consider Subscription Model
description:
Scott Galloway, Professor of Marketing at NYU Stern School of Business, discusses his thoughts on the future of Twitter as the social media company draws the ire of President Trump. He also says creating a Corona Corps could help fight the coronavirus and solve youth unemployment.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
